thread.section_title: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very pleasant stay
thread.title_full: Very pleasant stay - Review of Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: VidmantÄ— M
title: Very pleasant stay
text: Me and my colleagues were on 3 days business trip to Paris and decided to stay in this hotel because it's near exposition center and this decision was just perfect. First of all - staff were super friendly and helpful. Rooms were really spacious for French standards and modern, you could find everything that you need there. All hotel spaces were really clean what I'm expecting all the time.
